BBVAUDIA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Unidades de InversiÃ³n SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
BBVAUDIA.MX.summary: The objective of the B + REAL is offering investors the option to invest in a portfolio consisting mainly of debt instruments issued by domestic real rate the Federal Government, state or municipal, Banco de Mexico, Bank of Development, parastatals, centralized agencies , decentralized or deconcentrated. The Fund also may invest in derivatives on recognized markets and / or structured securities in accordance with the regulations issued by the CNBV and Banco de Mexico, denominated in local currency and / or foreign. The Fund will have a long-term investment strategy, seeking to capitalize on market movements.
BBVAUDIA.MX.family: BBVA Bancomer GestiÃ³n SA de CV

BLKREALA.MX.long_name: BLK Deuda Referenciada a InflaciÃ³n - Largo Plazo SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
BLKREALA.MX.summary: BNMREAL is an investment company that invests primarily in bonds denominated in investment units (IDUs) and seek to provide competitive performance with respect to the yields of government securities denominated in UDI. BNMREAL invest only in debt instruments denominated in UDI, or Mexican pesos. Such instruments may be at any time and may be issued by Mexican or foreign entities, including without limitation those issued by the Federal Government, parastatal entities centralized or Public Administration Federal, State or Municipal in the United Mexican States, banks, private companies and deposits.
BLKREALA.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV

PRINFTRA.MX.summary: The main objective of IXE2 will be to offer customers a portfolio asset returns comprised mainly of debt instruments through investment companies and funds managed by IXE complementarily of debt and equity securities. STEREALA.MX.long_name: Fondo SAM Deuda 6, S.A. de C.V. F.I.I.D. A
STEREALA.MX.summary: The Fund's objective is to invest in debt securities, government, bank and / or private, mainly denominated in domestic currency, looking for attractive returns that match their investment horizon, so that the Fund will invest primarily in long-term securities mostly real rate. For the formation of the portfolio, is considered a duration greater than three years.

SURREALA.MX.short_name: SURA Real SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
SURREALA.MX.long_name: SURA Real SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
SURREALA.MX.summary: The Fund's objective will be to provide attractive performance in the long term that incorporates performance movements in the national index of prices to the consumer. The Fund will invest primarily in securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government. In a complementary way, the Fund may invest in bank deposits, municipal, State debt, development banking, private securities placed through public offering, banking values, values listed in the SIC, values foreign instruments backed by assets, structured instruments so long as their underlying are within the values in the Fund's investment regime. Investment in derivative financial instruments will be for speculation purposes, provided that their underlying values authorized in the regime of investment of the Fund and maximum up to 50% of the investment. The Fund as a whole must invest at least 80% of their assets in real rate.
SURREALA.MX.family: SURA Investment Management MÃ©xico SA de CV

In a complementary way, the Fund may invest in bank deposits, municipal, State debt, development banking, private securities placed through public offering, banking values, values listed in the SIC, values foreign instruments backed by assets, structured instruments so long as their underlying are within the values in the Fund's investment regime. Investment in derivative financial instruments will be for speculation purposes, provided that their underlying values authorized in the regime of investment of the Fund and maximum up to 50% of the investment. The Fund as a whole must invest at least 80% of their assets in real rate.
SURREALBF1.MX.family: SURA Investment Management MÃ©xico SA de CV
